trainer_gear.name: Big Camping Tent
trainer_gear.description: A spacious tent for your group to stay a cozy night. Sprayed with Wild Pokémon repellent substances.

trainer_gear.name: Small Camping Tent
trainer_gear.description: A comfortable space for 1 person, or 2 if you don't mind squeezing.

trainer_gear.name: Sleeping Bag
trainer_gear.description: Not too comfortable. You'll be able to sleep warm and dry but after a few nights your back may hurt.

trainer_gear.name: Camping Stove & Cookware
trainer_gear.description: Forget about hunting and eating roots like a savage. With this luxury set you'll always have a warm meal.

trainer_gear.name: Canned Meal
trainer_gear.description: It's nothing fancy but there's no need to travel on an empty stomach. One can is enough for one day.

trainer_gear.name: Regional Map
trainer_gear.description: A map with the marked routes, cities and Pokémon Centers of the region you are in.

trainer_gear.name: Compass
trainer_gear.description: A useful compass to point you in the right direction. Warning: Keep away from magnets.

trainer_gear.name: Pokédex
trainer_gear.description: A digital encyclopedia with basic information about regional Pokémon. You may add your own research.

trainer_gear.name: Pokédex Upgrade
trainer_gear.description: Upgrade your Pokédex with the information of the Pokémon on a new region.

traveling_items.name: Mountain Bike
traveling_items.description: You will travel twice as fast with this awesome all-terrain. Now at an insane price!

traveling_items.name: Inflatable Boat
traveling_items.description: A small boat for a single person. Your Pokémon may pull you through the water or you can use the rows.

traveling_items.name: Fishing Rod
traveling_items.description: A fishing rod to catch Pokémon living underwater. Somedays they just won't bite, though.

traveling_items.name: Saddle
traveling_items.description: Strap this on and you'll never worry about falling from your Pokémon again.

traveling_items.name: Sled
traveling_items.description: Your Pokémon can pull you around through snow, sand or any smooth surface. It's super fun!

protection_items.name: Pokédolls
protection_items.description: Life-size decoy used to escape wild Pokémon. Some people like to collect them.

protection_items.name: Pokémon Repel
protection_items.description: Most Pokémon won't come near to you for a whole day. The smell is now machine-washable.

protection_items.name: Pepper Spray Can
protection_items.description: Scares away small Pokémon, but it may enrage the bigger ones. Good for 5 uses.

potions.name: Potion
potions.description: A pocket sized spray potion to relieve the pain and heal bruises.

potions.name: Super Potion
potions.description: A regular can of concentrated formula spray. This potion can close open wounds and even heal a cracked bone.

potions.name: Hyper Potion
potions.description: Best value pack. It can be rationed for smaller injuries on the team, or used all at once on a serious wound.

potions.name: Max Potion
potions.description: A single-use capsule of formula. The Pokémon won't be able to restore health further until the next day.

potions.name: Full Restore
potions.effect: Recovers full HP and heals all status conditions.
potions.description: A single-use capsule of deluxe formula. The Pokémon won't be able to restore health further until the next day.

status_heals.name: Antidote
status_heals.description: A shot that quickly reduces the fever and relieves the pain.

status_heals.name: Awakening
status_heals.description: Sprays a water-based solution to awake a drowsy Pokémon.

status_heals.name: Burn Heal
status_heals.description: A powder that douses the fire and aids in the healing of the burnt area.

status_heals.name: Ice Heal
status_heals.description: Recovers the normal temperature of the Pokémon and heals frost biting.

status_heals.name: Paralyze Heal
status_heals.description: This ointment relaxes the muscles and stops the cramping.

status_heals.name: Full Heal
status_heals.description: A superior spray formula that can heal any status problem in a second.

berries.name: Aspear Berry
berries.description: This sour berry shakes the body and rises its temperature, thawing any ice surrounding it.

berries.name: Cheri Berry
berries.description: Its spicy flavor reinvigorates the muscles and stops the cramping.

berries.name: Chesto Berry
berries.description: It is difficult to eat, so tough and dry that it will heal the drowsiness.

berries.name: Oran Berry
berries.description: A delicious citric berry that numbs pain away.

berries.name: Pecha Berry
berries.description: This berry's sweet pulp will absorb simple poison out of the bloodstream.

berries.name: Persim Berry
berries.description: A strong flavored berry to snap out of confusion.

berries.name: Rawst berry
berries.description: Its liquid pulp is ideal to stop fire from spreading and numbs the pain on the area, it is quite bitter, though.

berries.name: Sitrus Berry
berries.description: A bigger and sweeter berry from the Oran family but scarcer in the wild.

berries.name: Lum Berry
berries.description: This berry is said to cure everything, it is however very rare to find.

herbal_medicine.name: Energy Root
herbal_medicine.effect: Heals equivalent to 14 units of Potion.
herbal_medicine.description: A nasty tasting root with mystical properties that can be eaten whole or turned into up to 4 batches of powder if you know how to do it.

herbal_medicine.name: Energy Powder
herbal_medicine.effect: Heals equivalent to 4 units of Potion.
herbal_medicine.description: This powder leaves a horrid aftertaste, but at least it stops the pain.

herbal_medicine.name: Heal Powder
herbal_medicine.description: A mix of the most foul looking herbs you can find can make this cure-all powder.

herbal_medicine.name: Revival Herb
herbal_medicine.effect: Recovers full HP and restores awareness (revives a fainted Pokémon).
herbal_medicine.description: It may be its magical properties or just its awful flavor, but this herb will get you back into consciousness numbing all the pain away. Extremely rare to find.

revives.name: Revive
revives.effect: Recovers 1 HP and restores awareness (revives a fainted Pokémon).
revives.description: A small energy shard that brings a fainted Human or Pokémon back into conciousness and stabilizes their wounds.

revives.name: Max Revive
revives.effect: Recovers full HP and restores awareness (revives a fainted Pokémon).
revives.description: A bigger shard that is not available to the public.

energetic_drinks.name: Berry Juice
energetic_drinks.description: This mixed drink of various berries is also quite refreshing. Some Pokémon produce it naturally.

energetic_drinks.name: Fresh Water
energetic_drinks.description: Full of electrolytes and just the right amount of sodium, restores the vitality of those who are tired.

energetic_drinks.name: Sodapop
energetic_drinks.description: This Sugary drink gives you a quick shot of energy after being quite tired.

energetic_drinks.name: Lemonade
energetic_drinks.description: The Citric boost and added vitamins make this a favorite after exercise.

energetic_drinks.name: MooMoo Milk
energetic_drinks.description: Found in organic farms, this milk is full of calcium and is right out of the Miltank.

pokeballs.name: Pokéball
pokeballs.description: A basic ball for catching Pokémon and carrying heavy items.

pokeballs.name: Greatball
pokeballs.description: A sturdier barrier protects the seal allowing an easier catch.

pokeballs.name: Ultraball
pokeballs.description: The best seal in the market to ensure the catch of stronger Pokémon.

pokeballs.name: Masterball
pokeballs.description: It is said to be in development by some companies in the world, it is rumored to have a seal so strong it would never break.

pokemon_food.name: Gourmet Food Can
pokemon_food.description: Made with Premium ingredients. All Pokémon will love you if you feed them this on a regular basis.

pokemon_food.name: High Performance Food Sack
pokemon_food.description: A high-protein kibble made for athletes. Add 1 dice to the next Training Roll of the Pokémon.

vitamins.name: Protein
vitamins.effect: Increases Strength attribute by 1 for a month.
vitamins.description: A tasty milkshake that aids in the growth of bigger and stronger muscles.

vitamins.name: Iron
vitamins.effect: Increases Vitality attribute by 1 for a month.
vitamins.description: An iron capsule that reduces feebleness and gives you a healthy glow.

vitamins.name: Calcium
vitamins.effect: Increases Special attribute by 1 for a month.
vitamins.description: Add this effervescent pills on their drink to help grow stronger bones.

vitamins.name: Zinc
vitamins.effect: Increases Insight attribute by 1 for a month.
vitamins.description: Zinc capsules help with focus and brain development.

vitamins.name: Carbos
vitamins.effect: Increases Dexterity attribute by 1 for a month.
vitamins.description: A healthy syrup that fills you with energy!

vitamins.name: PP Up
vitamins.description: It is rumored they are just sugar pills. Who really knows?

vitamins.name: HP Up
vitamins.description: A compendium of vitamins and minerals to help your Pokémon grow as big and healthy as it can be.

vitamins.name: Rare Candy
vitamins.description: This strange candy is made of unknown ingredients but its effects do not stack.

grooming_items.name: Grooming Kit
grooming_items.description: No more matted hair, unruly leaves, dry scales or rough rocks!

grooming_items.name: Pokémon Costume
grooming_items.description: Fashionable clothes. Your companions will look amazing in these costumes and they will love it.

grooming_items.name: Piece of Accessory
grooming_items.description: Ribbons, hats, collars and everything you need to make them look super special.

evolutionary_items.name: Fire Stone
evolutionary_items.description: This Stone has a flame inside, it's hot to the touch.

evolutionary_items.name: Thunder Stone
evolutionary_items.description: It glows in the dark and can be used to power small electronics.

evolutionary_items.name: Water Stone
evolutionary_items.description: Looks like blue glass and can be found at the bottom of the sea.

evolutionary_items.name: Leaf Stone
evolutionary_items.description: It is said that the leaf encrusted to it comes from the tree of life itself.

evolutionary_items.name: Moon Stone
evolutionary_items.description: It is a black stone that turns white and luminescent when the moon shines over it.

evolutionary_items.name: Sun Stone
evolutionary_items.description: A red stone that shines brightly when facing the sun at morning.

evolutionary_items.name: Shiny Stone
evolutionary_items.description: Its crystal-like surface allows you to see a ball of light inside.

evolutionary_items.name: Dusk Stone
evolutionary_items.description: This stone seems to suck the light around into a small dark hole.

evolutionary_items.name: Dawn Stone
evolutionary_items.description: This cerulean stone shines with blinding light for a minute during sunrise.

held_items.name: Black Belt
held_items.effect: Adds damage to Fight type moves.

held_items.name: Black Glasses
held_items.effect: Adds damage to Dark type moves.

held_items.name: Charcoal
held_items.effect: Adds damage to Fire type moves.

held_items.name: Dragon Fang
held_items.effect: Adds damage to Dragon type moves.

held_items.name: Hard Stone
held_items.effect: Adds damage to Rock type moves.

held_items.name: Magnet
held_items.effect: Adds damage to Electric type moves.

held_items.name: Metal Coat
held_items.effect: Adds damage to Steel type moves.

held_items.name: Miracle Seed
held_items.effect: Adds damage to Grass type moves.

held_items.name: Mystic Water
held_items.effect: Adds damage to Water type moves.

held_items.name: Never-Melt Ice
held_items.effect: Adds damage to Ice type moves.

held_items.name: Poison Barb
held_items.effect: Adds damage to Poison type moves.

held_items.name: Sharp Beak
held_items.effect: Adds damage to Flying type moves.

held_items.name: Silk Scarf
held_items.effect: Adds damage to Normal type moves.

held_items.name: Silver Powder
held_items.effect: Adds damage to Bug type moves.

held_items.name: Soft Sand
held_items.effect: Adds damage to Ground type moves.

held_items.name: Spell Tag
held_items.effect: Adds damage to Ghost type moves.

held_items.name: Twisted Spoon
held_items.effect: Adds damage to Psychic type moves.

held_items.name: Life Orb
held_items.effect: Adds damage & recoil to all attacks.

held_items.name: Light Ball
held_items.effect: Boosts a Pikachu's Strength and Special.

held_items.name: King's Rock
held_items.effect: May cause the target to flinch.

held_items.name: Lucky Punch
held_items.effect: Boosts a Chansey or Blissey's Strength.

held_items.name: Lucky egg
held_items.effect: When the Pokémon defeats a foe, it will count as two victories for the purposes of Evolution.

held_items.name: Stick
held_items.effect: Allows Farfetch'd to fight swiftly (boosts critical hit ratio).

held_items.name: Quick Claw
held_items.effect: Boosts Initiative, allowing the holder to move faster.

held_items.name: Thick Club
held_items.effect: Boosts a Cubone or Marowak's Strength.

held_items.name: Razor Claw
held_items.effect: This sharp claw can pierce through tough surfaces with ease (boosts critical hit ratio).

held_items.name: Amulet Coin
held_items.effect: Doubles any prize money received.

held_items.name: Razor Fang
held_items.effect: May cause the target to flinch.

held_items.name: Eviolite
held_items.effect: Boosts the defenses of an un-evolved Pokémon.

held_items.name: Rocky Helmet
held_items.effect: Deals damage to a foe attacking with a Non-ranged Physical Attack.

held_items.name: Expert Belt
held_items.effect: Adds damage to Super Effective Moves.

held_items.name: Wide Lens
held_items.effect: Boosts the accuracy of moves.
